-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A strange tale of love and lust straight from the newspaper headlines, Mr. & 
Mrs. bin Laden tells the story of the fourth son of Osama bin Laden&#039;s 
controversial marriage to a British grandmother twice his age.

It was always the most unlikely of marriages: a 51-year-old grandmother and 
five-time divorcTe from Cheshire, to a 26-year-old Saudi man who already had a 
wife and child himself. The fact that the man Jane Felix Browne married was 
also the son of the world&#039;s most-wanted terrorist, and she is now Osama bin 
Laden&#039;s daughter-in-law, made the story almost unbelievable. But the truth 
about the relationship between Mrs. bin Laden and the young and severely 
smitten Omar bin Laden is wonderfully elusive. After all, Jane claimed that 
she knew from first glance that they would be married.

Filmmaker Lynn Alleway follows this unusual couple as they embark on a fresh 
start together. Omar talks about the burden of his last name, what he thinks 
about the Sept. 11 attack on the World Trade Center and his feelings for his 
father. This is the first time that a close family member of Osama bin Laden 
has given an in-depth interview.
